segments.text: Excuse me , I'm lost . Can you show me where I am in this map ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Er , let me see . Oh , look , you're right here . Pretty close to the Olympic Park .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great ! It's not my day . I just have very bad sense of direction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this your first time here ? Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am supposed to go to Liu Ichang .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , there are many Chinese antique stores . They get paintings , too . Do you get interested in them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Yes . Can you tell me how to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , it is quite far away from here . I'm afraid you're gonna have to take Bus No . 713 .
segments.speaker: S2
